/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with towering buildings and construction cranes, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban landscape and the natural elements within it.
